name: Scotland Yard (Round 1)
description:
Scotland Yard Round 1 Controls

WASD: Move

WASD + Left Shift: Run

Mouse: Look

Space: Jump

E: Play mini-games

F: Pick up Items

I: See Controls & Instructions

Escape: Pause Game

Instructions

Open the Pause Menu

Click SY button to open the Scotland Yard Menu

See current path as Path #N

See clues to locations on campus

See mysteries which unlock on playing the mini games

Solve the mystery

NITK BOWLING Controls

Space: Select the ball's position

W: Select the throwing power 

I: See Controls and Instructions Panel

Escape: To pause the Game

Instructions

Drop the pins.

3 Rounds and 2 throws in each.

Score above 10 points,

to unlock the next part of the mystery.

NITK SNIPER Controls

Mouse: Look

Right Click: Zoom

Left Click: Shoot the vaccine

I: See Controls and Instructions Panel

Escape: To pause the Game

Instructions

Vaccinate people in red without masks to gain time.

Don't shoot people with masks in green or white else lose time.

Get accuracy above 50%,

to unlock the next part of the mystery. 

NITK MAZE Controls

WASD: Move

WASD + Left Shift: Run

Mouse: Look

Space: Jump

E: Open Gates

I: See Controls and Instructions Panel

Escape: To pause the Game

Maze

Avoid the security cameras.

If you linger in their sight for too long, game over.

Find the way to the exit,

to unlock the next part of the mystery.

NITK PUZZLE Controls

R: Quick Restart Game

Space: To Stop (applies to all, including green)

Instructions

Red : Reverse rotation with 'W'.

Green : Movable brick. press space to stop.

Yellow : Disables light on enter, enables light on exit.

Blue : stationary red/green piece

Purple : destructible piece

Wood : doesn't move, just remains static.

Portal : blue is entry, orange is exit. press 's' to switch portals.

NITK RACE Controls

WASD: Drive

I: See Controls and Instructions Panel

Escape: To pause the Game

Instructions

Drive fast.

Drive through Pickups to gain additional time.

Reach the Finish Line before the timer runs out,

to unlock the next part of the mystery.
